revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I have the honor to enclose herewith a Commission appointing Isaac C. Mills Marshal of the United States for the Eastern District of Arkansas, in place of Robert F. Patterson, suspended.

You will be pleased to hand the Commission to Mr. Mills
app't U. S. Marshal Ea. Ark.
when he shall have given the bond, and taken the oath required by law.
